doc:
Sheb Wooley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sheb_Wooley 0 Shelby Fredrick "Sheb" Wooley (April 10, 1921 – September 16, 2003) was a character actor and singer, best known for his 1958 novelty song "The Purple People Eater." He played Ben Miller, brother of Frank Miller, in the film High Noon; played Travis Cobb in The Outlaw Josey Wales; and also had a co-starring role as scout Pete Nolan in the television series Rawhide. Additionally, Wooley recorded a series of novelty songs under the name Ben Colder, notably a #6 country hit "Almost Persuaded No. 2". Wooley is also credited as the voice actor who produced the Wilhelm scream sound effect. Shelby_Fredrick_"_Sheb_"_Wooley ( April_10_,_1921 – September_16_,_2003 ) was a_character_actor_and_singer , best_known for his_1958_novelty_song " The_Purple_People_Eater . " He played Ben_Miller , brother of Frank_Miller , in the_film_High_Noon ; played Travis_Cobb in The_Outlaw_Josey_Wales ; and also had a_co-starring_role as scout_Pete_Nolan in the_television_series_Rawhide . Additionally , Wooley recorded a_series of novelty_songs under the_name_Ben_Colder , notably a_#_6_country hit " Almost Persuaded No._2_" . Wooley is_also_credited as the_voice_actor who produced the_Wilhelm scream sound_effect .
